title: Element 119
description: Mandy Maguire and her best friend, Asia, are Midwestern girls preparing to start their freshman year at Harvard. Mandy is expecting a summer of working at the library and maybe a few parties but, instead, unexpectedly finds herself drawn to a mysterious young man whose secret will change Mandyâ€™s life forever. As she gets hurled into a race against time, will she be able to save those closest to her without losing her life or her heart in the process?
author: Jaimie Just
